businessProfile.name: Hail Mary Pizza
businessProfile.address: 3219 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90039, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3219 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90039, USA

reviews.text:
A group of 3, came to this pizza joint as it was highly recommended. It didn‚Äôt disappoint!

Ingredients were fresh and the pizza was a flat sourdough with a little bit of doughiness.

We got the supreme marinara with fresh basil, lilo Hawaiian, dry rubbed wings with a hot honey sauce drizzle and a Caesar salad. Drinks ordered were guava Jarrito, Coca Cola and a beer.

Everything was great but be prepared to spend a bit of money. Everything cost just over $130 USD.

Just an all around great spot for dinner. Staff were friendly and helpful. Lots varieties of pizza. Went with the ‚ÄúGarbage ‚Äú great crust, sauce loved the toppings. Also had the Caesar salad wasn‚Äôt drenched in dressing which i really appreciated. Croutons had a nice spice. Decor was ordinal and cool and great music. Definitely will be coming back

Hail Mary Pizza is THE BEST! They use fresh ingredients and the flavors are evidence of their dedication to high quality. I am lucky to live nearby and indulge frequently. I am also always happy to support my local community businesses. Although, I think that even if I lived far, I would make the drive to Atwater just for Hail Mary. If you dine in, try the wines, they carry a great selection. The lettuces salad is perfection, so simple and so good. And the cookies!! YUM! üòã As for the staff, super cool team that enjoys what they do, they are very friendly and down to earth. Hail Mary is one of those rare neighborhood spots that consistently make great food. With so many spots closing soon after opening, I‚Äôm happy to see Hail Mary continuing to thrive 6+ years in. XOXO, IHM

The Supreme Margarita is really good, but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend the regular one‚Äîthe mozzarella on it is bland and rubbery. The dough is thin and crispy, just as it should be. The Basque cake is nothing special and doesn‚Äôt look like the pictures on the menu. Self service, took a while to order at the counter.

Had been wanting to eat here for a while based on reviews and I‚Äôm happy we finally did. Fantastic pizza, some of the best we‚Äôve had. Unique topping combos, not everything is spicy and flavors were distinct. Dough and crust were just to our liking.

editorial_summary.overview: Eatery serving pizza, salads, beer, wine, and many vegetarian options.

recentReviews.author: Ben Voelker
recentReviews.text: Just an all around great spot for dinner. Staff were friendly and helpful. Lots varieties of pizza. Went with the ‚ÄúGarbage ‚Äú great crust, sauce loved the toppings. Also had the Caesar salad wasn‚Äôt drenched in dressing which i really appreciated. Croutons had a nice spice. Decor was ordinal and cool and great music. Definitely will be coming back

recentReviews.author: Dustin Copeland
recentReviews.text:
A group of 3, came to this pizza joint as it was highly recommended. It didn‚Äôt disappoint!

Ingredients were fresh and the pizza was a flat sourdough with a little bit of doughiness.

We got the supreme marinara with fresh basil, lilo Hawaiian, dry rubbed wings with a hot honey sauce drizzle and a Caesar salad. Drinks ordered were guava Jarrito, Coca Cola and a beer.

Everything was great but be prepared to spend a bit of money. Everything cost just over $130 USD.

recentReviews.author: ingrid hernandez-morrison
recentReviews.text: Hail Mary Pizza is THE BEST! They use fresh ingredients and the flavors are evidence of their dedication to high quality. I am lucky to live nearby and indulge frequently. I am also always happy to support my local community businesses. Although, I think that even if I lived far, I would make the drive to Atwater just for Hail Mary. If you dine in, try the wines, they carry a great selection. The lettuces salad is perfection, so simple and so good. And the cookies!! YUM! üòã As for the staff, super cool team that enjoys what they do, they are very friendly and down to earth. Hail Mary is one of those rare neighborhood spots that consistently make great food. With so many spots closing soon after opening, I‚Äôm happy to see Hail Mary continuing to thrive 6+ years in. XOXO, IHM

recentReviews.author: Oxana Z
recentReviews.text: The Supreme Margarita is really good, but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend the regular one‚Äîthe mozzarella on it is bland and rubbery. The dough is thin and crispy, just as it should be. The Basque cake is nothing special and doesn‚Äôt look like the pictures on the menu. Self service, took a while to order at the counter.

recentReviews.author: John Testro
recentReviews.text: Had been wanting to eat here for a while based on reviews and I‚Äôm happy we finally did. Fantastic pizza, some of the best we‚Äôve had. Unique topping combos, not everything is spicy and flavors were distinct. Dough and crust were just to our liking.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the fresh ingredients and high-quality flavors of the pizza, which they say are evidence of the restaurant's dedication to quality. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The unique and distinct topping combinations on the pizzas are a standout feature that customers love, offering a variety of flavors without everything being spicy. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

The friendly and down-to-earth staff create a welcoming atmosphere that enhances the dining experience, making customers feel appreciated and eager to return. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times for self-service ordering - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Bland and rubbery mozzarella on the regular margarita pizza - review management can address this concern
Basque cake not meeting expectations and differing from menu images - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
